links.pickMentor: Get help to find a mentor

footer.desc: educational platform for searching professional mentors in creative fields. Correspondence address: [address]

primaryInfo.title:
1-on-1 with 
 dedicated mentor
primaryInfo.desc:
Improve effectively your *creative skillsd* in individual sessions with professional 
 mentors on your side

help.title: Don’t know where to start?
help.desc:
Just write to us, we will help you choose a mentor 
 and answer all your questions

home.bigComment:
We are Creaty. *We help find mentors in the creative industriesd* to choose your career path, find an interesting job 
 or understand how to grow as a pro faster

1.title: Describe your goals
1.desc:
Leave {{requestButton}}, so that we can 
 contact you and understand what kind 
 of help you need

2.title: Choose a mentor
2.desc:
After choosing a mentor, you will have 
 a FREE 15-minute trial session where 
 you can discuss in details your goals 
 and learing plan

3.title: Grow professionally!
3.desc:
And let your inner passion lead you to 
 great new career achievements with 
 dedicated mentors on your side

help.title: First trial session is *FREE!*
help.desc:
To understand how you fit each other, agree on a learning plan 
 and class schedule

becomeMentor.title: You too can become mentor
becomeMentor.desc:
Share your experience and knowledge when and where it suits you most
-Keep evolving your professional skills during sessions with students
-Get extra income
becomeMentor.terms: By clicking on the button, I agree to the processing of personal data in accordance with [privacy policy]({{policyLink}})

mailingSubscribe.title:
Trends in *creative industriesd* news, best practices 
 and much more in the Creaty newsletter

mentors.title: Mentors
mentors.desc:
*Professionals from the creative industriesd* are ready to help you choose the right career path, find an interesting job or 
 understand how to grow professionally faster.

card.terms: By clicking on the button, I consent to the processing of my personal data in accordance with [privacy policy]({{policyLink}})

garantee.title: Your guarantee
garantee.desc:
If for some reason you think that you have wasted your money and time uselessly, write to us.
 We will investigate the situation and find a solution.

bookMentor.title: Request a session with mentor
bookMentor.desc: You can pay for the session only after agreeing with a manager about the time and details. In the meantime, send request so that we can contact you in a convenient way.

1.title:
You are on start or 
 choosing career path
1.desc:
You decided to change your occupation, but there is
no clear understanding of where to start
-You have chosen the path of your creative career,
but doubt that this is the best way
-You want to talk with an industry professional to
assess different options and your expectations

2.title:
You have more than 
 2 years of experience
2.desc:
You want to expand the area of expertise or change
your career path
-You want to get professional assessment of your
skills and competencies
-You need help with you project or work tasks

3.title:
You are student or 
 recently graduated
3.desc:
You need help with your student project or portfolio
-Need an expert opinion or professional assessment
-You have completed your study but need job advice
-You want to create a career development plan

4.title:
You just got a new 
 job or started an 
 internship
4.desc:
You need help with complex tasks
-You got a good job but it is hard to get into details
-You need advice about job processes, professional
ethics and work tasks
-You want to understand how you can grow
professionally faster and more efficiently

contactForm.terms: By clicking on the button, I agree to the processing of personal data in accordance with the [privacy policy]({{policyLink}})

cookies.desc: we store cookies to personalize the service. You can prevent this by changing your browser settings.

subscribe.thanks: *Thank you!d* We'll be back soon with good news :)
subscribe.terms: By clicking «subscibe» you'll receive occasional emails from Creaty. You always have the choice to unsubscribe within every email you receive.

haveQuestions.title: Still have questions?
haveQuestions.desc:
If you have any questions about the learning format or you don't know what mentor to choose, just fill in the form and send it to us:
*we will contact you to answer all your questionsd*

helpSocial.text:
Ask questions where it's
